sentences.sContent: But this Dom Cobb – we'll call him Christopher Nolan – doesn't need a specially formulated sedative.
sentences.sContent_eng: But this Dom Cobb – we'll call him Christopher Nolan – doesn't need a specially formulated sedative.
sentences.sCn: 不过这个柯布——我们将叫他克里斯托弗·诺兰——并不需要特殊配方的镇静剂。

sentences.sContent: Milk contains tryptophan, the amino acids that have a sedative effect and calcium that helps the brain use tryptophan.
sentences.sContent_eng: Milk contains tryptophan, the amino acids that have a sedative effect and calcium that helps the brain use tryptophan.
sentences.sCn: 牛奶中含有色氨酸，具有镇静效果的氨基酸，以及可以有助于大脑利用色氨酸的钙。

sentences.sContent: After repeated prodding, Murray revealed a few details about his actions, saying he had only given Jackson a dose of the sedative lorazepam to help him sleep, Senneff testified.
sentences.sContent_eng: After repeated prodding, Murray revealed a few details about his actions, saying he had only given Jackson a dose of the sedative lorazepam to help him sleep, Senneff testified.
sentences.sCn: 在不断的敦促下，莫里透露了他活动的几个细节，他说他仅仅给了杰克逊以及镇静剂帮他入睡，这个，斯尼弗可以作证。

synos.tran: [药][医]镇静剂；能使安静的东西；止痛药

words.tran: 镇静；镇静作用；镇静状态
